verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* firstfruits \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* offereth \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w accord|strong="H3820"\w*, \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w must|strong="H0853"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w*: \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*,

\w Violet|strong="H8504"\w* \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* twice dyed, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w goats’|strong="H5795"\w* hair,

\w And|strong="H6086"\w* rams’ \w skins|strong="H5785"\w* \w dyed|strong="H0119"\w* \w red|strong="H0119"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* violet \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* setim \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*:

\w Oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w to|strong="H8081"\w* make \w lights|strong="H3974"\w*: \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* \w for|strong="H8081"\w* \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w for|strong="H8081"\w* sweetsmelling \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*:

\w Onyx|strong="H7718"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0068"\w* precious \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w to|strong="H0068"\w* adorn the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w and|strong="H0068"\w* the rational.

\w And|strong="H4720"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w* me \w a|strong="H8432"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, \w and|strong="H4720"\w* I will \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H8432"\w*:

According \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w likeness|strong="H8403"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* shew thee, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* service thereof: \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w thus|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w*:

Frame an \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w of|strong="H0727"\w* setim \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w length|strong="H0753"\w* whereof shall \w be|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H0727"\w* \w two|strong="H2677"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H2677"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w*: \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*, \w a|strong="H2677"\w* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H2677"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w*: \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w height|strong="H6967"\w*, likewise, \w a|strong="H2677"\w* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H2677"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* thou shalt \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* purest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* without: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* crown \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*:

\w And|strong="H2091"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*, which thou shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* corners \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ark: \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w that|strong="H0935"\w* are \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sides|strong="H6763"\w* \w of|strong="H0727"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, \w that|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* may \w be|strong="H5375"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0905"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* always \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* drawn \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H2677"\w* propitiatory \w of|strong="H0753"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* purest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H2889"\w* be \w two|strong="H2677"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w a|strong="H2677"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w a|strong="H2677"\w* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w a|strong="H2677"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w*.

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* cherubims \w of|strong="H8147"\w* beaten \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w on|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* sides \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* oracle.

Let \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* \w be|strong="H4480"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* cover \w both|strong="H5921"\w* sides \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* propitiatory, \w spreading|strong="H6566"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w covering|strong="H3671"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* oracle, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* look \w one|strong="H0376"\w* towards \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w other|strong="H0251"\w*, \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w being|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* towards \w the|strong="H6440"\w* propitiatory wherewith \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* covered.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

Thence \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H6680"\w* \w orders|strong="H6680"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* propitiatory, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H0996"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* cherubims, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H2677"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* setim \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w two|strong="H2677"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w in|strong="H0520"\w* \w length|strong="H0753"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H2677"\w* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \w in|strong="H0520"\w* \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w a|strong="H2677"\w* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w in|strong="H0520"\w* \w height|strong="H6967"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2091"\w* thou shalt \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* \w it|strong="H5439"\w* \w with|strong="H6823"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* purest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \w and|strong="H2091"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5439"\w* \w it|strong="H5439"\w* a \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* ledge \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2091"\w* \w to|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* ledge \w itself|strong="H6213"\w* a polished crown, four inches high: \w and|strong="H2091"\w* over \w the|strong="H5439"\w* same another little \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* crown.

Thou shalt \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H6285"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* table \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w each|strong="H0702"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w Under|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* crown \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* golden \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w bars|strong="H0905"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H5375"\w* through \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w bars|strong="H0905"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w themselves|strong="H0905"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H6086"\w* setim \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* shalt \w overlay|strong="H6823"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H6823"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w to|strong="H6086"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.

Thou shalt \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w dishes|strong="H7086"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w bowls|strong="H4518"\w*, censers, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* cups, \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* libations \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0834"\w* be offered \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* purest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3899"\w* thou shalt \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w loaves|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* proposition \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w always|strong="H8548"\w*.

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* candlestick \w of|strong="H4480"\w* beaten \w work|strong="H4749"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* finest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w shaft|strong="H7070"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w*, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w cups|strong="H1375"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* bowls, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* lilies going forth \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* \w shall|strong="H7070"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w sides|strong="H6654"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w*.

\w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cups|strong="H1375"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w were|strong="H6525"\w* nuts \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w branch|strong="H7070"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* bowl withal, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* lily; \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cups|strong="H1375"\w*, \w likewise|strong="H3651"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* fashion \w of|strong="H4480"\w* nuts \w in|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w branch|strong="H7070"\w*, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* bowl withal, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* lily. \w Such|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H7070"\w* \w be|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* work \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w*, \w that|strong="H3651"\w* are \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w shaft|strong="H7070"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4501"\w* \w in|strong="H6525"\w* the candlestick itself shall be \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cups|strong="H1375"\w* \w in|strong="H6525"\w* the manner \w of|strong="H4501"\w* a nut, \w and|strong="H4501"\w* at every one, bowls \w and|strong="H4501"\w* lilies.

Bowls \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* \w in|strong="H8478"\w* three \w places|strong="H8478"\w*, which \w together|strong="H8478"\w* make \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w shaft|strong="H7070"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2091"\w* \w both|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bowls \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w branches|strong="H7070"\w* \w shall|strong="H7070"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H0259"\w* beaten \w work|strong="H4749"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* purest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* shalt \w set|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* candlestick, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w give|strong="H0215"\w* \w light|strong="H0215"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w*.

The \w snuffers|strong="H4457"\w* also \w and|strong="H2091"\w* where the snuffings \w shall|strong="H2889"\w* be put out, \w shall|strong="H2889"\w* be made \w of|strong="H2091"\w* the purest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* weight \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* candlestick \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H0428"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3605"\w* \w talent|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* purest \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* according \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w pattern|strong="H8403"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* shewn thee \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.
